body:
{
  "tb365Data": {
    "projectName": "Enhanced Real Estate Template",
    "savedAt": "2025-01-30T10:00:00.000Z",
    "version": "1.0",
    "canvasState": {
      "elements": [
        {
          "id": "header-bg",
          "type": "rectangle",
          "position": { "x": 0, "y": 0 },
          "size": { "width": 800, "height": 120 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "header-background",
          "zIndex": 1,
          "fill": "#2c5aa0",
          "stroke": "#1e3f73",
          "strokeWidth": 2,
          "cornerRadius": 0
        },
        {
          "id": "agency-name-template",
          "type": "text",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 20 },
          "size": { "width": 300, "height": 30 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "agency-name",
          "zIndex": 2,
          "content": "{{agency.name}}",
          "fontSize": 24,
          "fontFamily": "Arial",
          "fontWeight": "bold",
          "fontStyle": "normal",
          "textAlign": "left",
          "color": "#ffffff",
          "backgroundColor": "transparent",
          "padding": 0
        },
        {
          "id": "property-subtitle-mixed",
          "type": "text",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 60 },
          "size": { "width": 760, "height": 25 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "property-subtitle",
          "zIndex": 3,
          "content": "Located in {{property.city}}, {{property.state}} {{property.zip}} - Beautiful neighborhood!",
          "fontSize": 16,
          "fontFamily": "Georgia",
          "fontWeight": "normal",
          "fontStyle": "normal",
          "textAlign": "center",
          "color": "#666666",
          "backgroundColor": "transparent",
          "padding": 0
        },
        {
          "id": "static-title",
          "type": "text",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 100 },
          "size": { "width": 760, "height": 35 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "static-title",
          "zIndex": 4,
          "content": "Dream Home Real Estate Listings",
          "fontSize": 28,
          "fontFamily": "Georgia",
          "fontWeight": "bold",
          "fontStyle": "normal",
          "textAlign": "center",
          "color": "#2c5aa0",
          "backgroundColor": "transparent",
          "padding": 0
        },
        {
          "id": "contact-mixed",
          "type": "text",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 150 },
          "size": { "width": 760, "height": 50 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "contact-info",
          "zIndex": 5,
          "content": "Call us today at {{agent.phone}} or visit our website at {{agency.website}}\nOffice Hours: Monday-Friday 9AM-6PM",
          "fontSize": 14,
          "fontFamily": "Arial",
          "fontWeight": "normal",
          "fontStyle": "normal",
          "textAlign": "center",
          "color": "#333333",
          "backgroundColor": "transparent",
          "padding": 0
        },
        {
          "id": "property-table",
          "type": "table",
          "position": { "x": 20, "y": 220 },
          "size": { "width": 300, "height": 120 },
          "visible": true,
          "locked": false,
          "name": "property-details",
          "zIndex": 6,
          "rows": 3,
          "columns": 2,
          "cells": [
            [
              { "content": "Property Details", "isHeader": true },
              { "content": "Value", "isHeader": true }
            ],
            [
              { "content": "Price", "isHeader": false },
              { "content": "${{property.price}}", "isHeader": false }
            ],
            [
              { "content": "Square Footage", "isHeader": false },
              { "content": "{{property.sqft}} sq ft", "isHeader": false }
            ]
          ],
          "cellPadding": 8,
          "borderWidth": 1,
          "borderColor": "#cccccc",
          "headerBackground": "#f5f5f5",
          "cellBackground": "#ffffff",
          "textColor": "#333333",
          "fontSize": 14,
          "fontFamily": "Arial"
        }
      ],
      "selectedElementId": null,
      "editingElementId": null,
      "editingTableCell": null,
      "activeTool": "select",
      "canvasSize": { "width": 800, "height": 400 },
      "zoom": 1,
      "snapToGrid": false,
      "gridSize": 20
    }
  },
  "options": {
    "outputFormat": "json",
    "includeAssets": false,
    "generatePreview": true
  }
}
